content.rendered:
[vc_row 0=””][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text 0=””]Carol A. Albert and Ronald M. Dash , former Case Management Masters, are available to arbitrate Civil Motions privately on consent at convenient times. Such motions may also be determined on-line by  using ZOOM video conference technology. The disputes can be dealt with completely online.

To book a  Civil Motion, please contact ADR Chambers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_btn title=”Request a Civil Motion” style=”custom” custom_background=”#dd0046″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-calendar” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fadrchambers.com%2Frequest-a-neutral%2F|||”][vc_custom_heading text=”Other ADR Services” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”66″][/vc_column][/vc_row].
